جیک ڈورسی سکوائر کے سی ای او ہیں: Who is the CEO of Square? Jack Dorsey Square CEO
No good Google Search Result was found
Who is the CEO of Square? Jack Dorsey Square CEO

Jack Patrick Dorsey (born November 19, 1976) is an American businessperson, who is a co-founder of Twitter, Inc. and its CEO during 2007–2008 and 2015–2021, as well as co-founder, principal executive officer and chairman of Block, Inc. (developer of the Square financial services platform).
جیک ڈورسی سکوائر کے شریک بانی ہیں: Who is the co-founder of Square? Jack Dorsey Square co-founder
Who is the co-founder of Square? Jack Dorsey Square co-founder
Dorsey, along with co-founder Jim McKelvey, developed a small business platform to accept debit and credit card payments on a mobile device called Square, released in May 2010.
